import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import products from '../product'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form, } from 'react-bootstrap'; function ProductScreen({ match }) { console.log(match); const product = products.find((p) => p._id == match.params.id); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} ); } export default ProductScreen;
